import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { StateContext } from '../context'; import { v4 as uuid } from 'uuid'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default function SignUp() { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [username, setUsername] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [first, setFirst] = useState(''); const [last, setLast] = useState(''); const [street, setStreet] = useState(''); const [city, setCity] = useState(''); const [state, setState] = useState(''); const [zip, setZip] = useState(''); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(''); const { mode } = useContext(StateContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); fetch('http://localhost:3000/users', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ id: uuid(), username, password, first, last, street, city, state, zip, email, phone, }), }) .then((r) => r.json()) .then((data) => setUsers([...users, data])) .then(navigate('src/routes/SignedUp')); } return ( >

Sign Up


setUsername(e.target.value)} />

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

setFirst(e.target.value)} />

); }
